bug.author: asampat3090
bug.summary: testing of the main.py function in CLI nonexistant
bug.description: there is nothing testing the main.py file for the CLI. This means that the tests can all pass BUT the CLI can be non-functional Solution: either include CLI level testing (which is not ideal) or a python based test for the main.py file

comments.comment:
From PR <denchmark-link:https://github.com/datmo/datmo/pull/190>#190</denchmark-link> the following were done
test of the command flows (in the datmo/cli/command/tests directory) test of the main.py via subprocess (in the datmo/cli/tests/ directory)
